Several people have been having problems running Eclipse because their Linux 
system has a color depth that we do not support. Specifically, getImageData 
fails for 15 bit color depth, and I believe it also fails for 32 bit color 
depth. The fix is to look at the bits per pixel as well as the color depth, and 
scale up or down appropriately.

Here is the information from an Eclipse Corner post, including the walkback and 
the xdpyinfo:

fine on the console.  I also have Cygwin/XFree86 running under Windows
